Properties.Name: type
Properties.HelpText:
The type of door.
Known internally as 'big'
0 = LCZ/ECZ door
1 = large blast door
2 = HCZ door
3 = elevator door

Properties.Name: open
Properties.HelpText: Whether or not the door is open. (0/1)

Properties.Name: locked
Properties.HelpText: Whether or not the door is locked. (0/1)

Properties.Name: code
Properties.HelpText:
Keypad code.
Leave blank for none.

Properties.Name: did
Properties.HelpText:
Used by developers so that it can be controlled internally.
Leave -1 to not assign a unique ID.
